official_title: A bill to modify the boundaries of the Big South Fork National River and Recreation Area to exclude an area known as the Lick Branch Oil Fields.

summary.text: Modifies the boundaries of the Big South Fork National River and Recreation Area in the State of Tennessee to exclude an area known as the Lick Branch Oil Fields.

titles.title: A bill to modify the boundaries of the Big South Fork National River and Recreation Area to exclude an area known as the Lick Branch Oil Fields.
